    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyType

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyType(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Helper method for getting the property type off the attribute
        Parameters:
        propertyName - - the name of the property we are getting the property type of
        Returns:
        the property type, returns a blank string if the property type used is not supported

      • getACL

        public static java.lang.String getACL(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> pipelineProps,
                                      java.lang.String objectType,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]> nodeProperties,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> aclMap,
                                      java.lang.String defaultACL)
        Retrieves the appropriate ACL; fails the node if this lookup fails.
        Parameters:
        pipelineProps - - the properties on the MigrationPipeline
        objectType - - the object type of the node
        nodeProperties - - a map of attribute names and values for the given node
        aclMap - - a map of object type to ACL
        defaultACL - - the default ACL
        Returns:
        acl - the acl for the node

      • getAclFromCachedMap

        public static java.lang.String getAclFromCachedMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> aclMap,
                                                   java.lang.String objectType,
                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]> nodeProperties,
                                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> securityTypeConditions)
        Retrieves the appropriate ACL using the cached ACL Map and security conditions map. Note: these maps are added as extra properties on the pipeline in {QueryForAclObjectsUsingSolr.java}
        Parameters:
        aclMap - - a map of object types & conditions to corresponding ACLs (built in {QueryForAclObjectsUsingSolr.java#createAclMapOnStartup})
        objectType - - the object type of the node being migrated
        nodeProperties - - a map of attribute names and values for the given node
        securityTypeConditions - - a map of security attributes for each object type (built in {QueryForAclObjectsUsingSolr.java#getSecurityObjectConditions})
        Returns:
        appliedAcl - the String id of the ACL to apply to the given node.

      • searchAclMap

        public static java.lang.String searchAclMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> aclMap,
                                            java.lang.String objectType)
        Looks through the map to get the acl for the given object type
        Parameters:
        aclMap - - a map that maps an object type to a specific ACL
        objectType - - the object type of the document
        Returns:
        - aclId - the acl that we want to apply to the document

      • getNodeProperties

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]> getNodeProperties(MigrationNode node,
                                                                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> objectTypePropsList)
        Gets a map of node properties
        Parameters:
        node - - the migration node
        objectTypePropsList - - the list of properties to get from the node
        Returns:
        nodeProps- a map of each of the properties in objectTypePropsList that existed on the node and its value
